amendment.description: An amendment numbered 34 printed in Part A of House Report 118-216 to direct $50 million from O&M Defense-Wide to the Defense Production Act Purchases account, intended to fund the Advanced Defense Capabilities Pilot Program, as authorized by Section 853 of the House-passed FY24 NDAA and Section 831 of the Senate-passed FY24 NDAA.
amendment.purpose: Amendment redirects $50 million from O&M Defense-Wide account to the Defense Production Act Purchases account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Houlahan amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 240 - 191 (Roll no. 431).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Houlahan amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 240 - 191 (Roll no. 431).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Houlahan amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 240 - 191 (Roll no. 431).
